fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Go to someone's house and convince them to murder someone. As you're a small child, they'll do it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target has a killing ability, they'll be redirected to the person you want them to kill. If they're not using their killing ability, you'll force them to use it.
- If your target does not have a killing ability, they'll be forced to visit the person you want them to kill. They'll release their inner SK and pull out a knife, dealing a Basic attack.
